item.name: UPS battery ABM state
item.description: Gives the status of the Advanced Battery Management; batteryFloating(3) status means that the charger is temporarily charging the battery to its float voltage;batteryResting(4) is the state when the battery is fully charged and none of the other actions (charging/discharging/floating) is being done.

item.name: UPS battery capacity
item.description: Battery percent charge

item.name: UPS battery current
item.description: Battery Current as reported by the UPS metering. Current is positive when discharging, negative when recharging the battery.

item.name: UPS battery voltage
item.description: Battery voltage as reported by the UPS meters.

item.name: UPS environment ambient humidity
item.description: The reading of the ambient humidity in the vicinity of the UPS or SNMP agent.

item.name: UPS environment ambient temperature
item.description: The reading of the ambient temperature in the vicinity of the UPS or SNMP agent.

item.name: UPS environment ambient temperature lower limit
item.description: The Lower Limit of the ambient temperature;if xupsEnvAmbientTemp falls below this value, the xupsAmbientTempBad alarm will occur.

item.name: UPS environment ambient temperature upper limit
item.description: The Upper Limit of the ambient temperature;if xupsEnvAmbientTemp rises above this value, the xupsAmbientTempBad alarm will occur. This value should be greater than xupsEnvAmbientLowerLimit.

item.name: UPS environment remote humidity
item.description: The reading of a remote humidity sensor connected to the UPS or SNMP agent.

item.name: UPS environment remote humidity lower limit
item.description: The Lower Limit of the remote humidity reading;if xupsEnvRemoteHumidity falls below this value, the xupsRemoteHumidityBad alarm will occur.

item.name: UPS environment remote humidity upper limit
item.description: The Upper Limit of the remote humidity reading;if xupsEnvRemoteHumidity rises above this value, the xupsRemoteHumidityBad alarm will occur. This value should be greater than xupsEnvRemoteHumidityLowerLimit.

item.name: UPS environment remote temperature
item.description: The reading of a remote temperature sensor connected to the UPS or SNMP agent.

item.name: UPS environment remote temperature lower limit
item.description: The Lower Limit of the remote temperature;if xupsEnvRemoteTemp falls below this value, the xupsRemoteTempBad alarm will occur.

item.name: UPS environment remote temperature upper limit
item.description: The Upper Limit of the remote temperature;if xupsEnvRemoteTemp rises above this value, the xupsRemoteTempBad alarm will occur. This value should be greater than xupsEnvRemoteTempLowerLimit.

item.name: UPS input frequency
item.description: The utility line frequency in tenths of Hz.

item.name: UPS input out of tolerance count
item.description: The number of times the Input was out of tolerance in voltage or frequency.

item.name: UPS input source
item.description: The present external source of input power. The enumeration none(2) indicates that there is no external source of power, for example, the UPS is On Battery (an internal source). The bypassFeed(4) can only be used when the Bypass source is known to be a separate utility feed than the primaryUtility(3).

item.name: UPS manufacturer
item.description: The UPS Manufacturer Name (e.g. Powerware Corporation).

item.name: UPS model
item.description: The UPS Model (e.g. Powerware Plus Model 18).

item.name: UPS output frequency
item.description: The measured UPS output frequency in tenths of Hz.

item.name: UPS output load
item.description: The UPS output load in percent of rated capacity.

item.name: UPS output source
item.description: The present source of output power. The enumeration none(2) indicates that there is no source of output power (and therefore no output power), for example, the system has opened the output breaker.

item.name: UPS run time remaining
item.description: Battery run time in seconds before UPS turns off due to low battery.

item_prototype.name: UPS input current on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured UPS input current in amps.

item_prototype.name: UPS input voltage on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured input voltage from the UPS metering in volts.

item_prototype.name: UPS input watts on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured real input power in watts.

item_prototype.name: UPS output current on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured UPS output current in amps.

item_prototype.name: UPS output voltage on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured output voltage from the UPS metering in volts.

item_prototype.name: UPS output watts on phase L{#SNMPVALUE}
item_prototype.description: The measured real output power in watts.

trigger.name: UPS ambient temperature is above upper limit
UPS ambient temperature is below lower limit
UPS battery is at half capacity
UPS remaining run time is less than 10 minutes
UPS remaining run time is less than an hour

dependency.name: UPS remaining run time is less than 10 minutes

trigger.name: UPS remote temperature is above upper limit
UPS remote temperature is below lower limit
